```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggformula)
library(png)
library(ggpubr)
library(grid)
```

## R Markdown

```{r}
img <- png::readPNG("soccerfield.png")
```


```{r Long Ball}
longBallClean %>% gf_jitter(longbally ~ longballx, color =~ LongBallSuccess, width = 1, height = 1) + scale_fill_continuous(guide = FALSE) + annotation_custom(rasterGrob(img, width = unit(0.82, "npc"),height = unit(1.1,"npc")),-Inf, Inf, -Inf, Inf) + lims(x=c(-0.6,4.6), y = c(0,5))
```
